values: 紧的；紧密的；紧绷的；紧贴的；牢固的；密封的；紧身的；难解开的；狭窄的；严密的；吝啬的；小气的；节俭的；喝醉的；难以应付的；无回旋余地的；紧迫的；急转的；紧张的；精确的；严格的；严厉的；密集的；亲密的；势均力敌的
紧密地；牢固地；紧紧地；严密地；紧凑地；严格地；密切地

synonym.mean: 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的

word_group.brief_definition: 处境艰难, 处于困境
预算紧张；资金紧张；手头紧张
留在原处等候；不采取行动；固执己见
(尤用以打发孩子睡觉)睡个好觉
银根紧；信用紧缩；银根紧缩
日程紧；紧凑日程；日程安排紧凑
处境困难；极度拥挤；狭道

bilingual.source: To move or act restlessly or nervously with a tight collar or a skirt will harm your professional image.
bilingual.target: 紧扣着衣领或穿者绷紧的裙子会让你不安或紧张，可能损害你的职业形象。

bilingual.source: Walking the tight rope and finding balance to me means perfecting all of these areas nearly 100% of the time and this is exhausting and unatainable.
bilingual.target: 对于我来说，在绷紧的绳子上行走和寻找平衡意味着疲惫和无法得到。

bilingual.source: Dazed and blinded, I held tight to the sled handlebar.
bilingual.target: 头晕目眩，我紧紧抓住雪橇把手。

bilingual.source: She popped the almonds into my purse and pulled the drawstrings tight.
bilingual.target: 她把杏仁放进我的钱包里并拉紧了抽绳。
她给了他一个紧紧的抱抱。
我的日程安排非常紧张。

list.abstract: tight（英[taɪt]，美[taɪt]），英语单词，作形容词用，为牢固的；不松动的；拉紧的。作副词用，为紧；紧紧地；牢牢地。短语搭配有be in a tight corner（处境艰难,，处于困境），例句为“She was accustomed to tight schedules.（她习惯于紧张的日程安排。）” tight形容词类近义词有severe、hard、fast等，副词类近义词有thoroughly、entirely、completely等，相关反义词有loose、leaky，动词形式为tighten。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, make sure that's tied up nice and tight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要绑得很紧。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a tight little group, aren't you? Yeah, we are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们是个关系很亲密的小群体，对吧？是啊，没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes. Well it's very beautiful. It's cream-colored and tight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗，很漂亮，米色的，很紧。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't mean tight, I mean it's not too tight, not that I was looking at...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是指很紧，不会很紧，我没有在看…

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Do you think maybe it's tight because you're wearing long underwear? Yes, of course that's why it's tight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你不觉得之所以会紧是因为你里面穿了套长的内衣裤吗？废话，当然是因为这个。

yingyinNormal.en: And grip it tight. You don't wanna be sliding off the end.
yingyinNormal.zh: 紧紧抓住，可别滑下来啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, hang tight. Hey, do you want me to bring anything?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，撑住，你还需要我带什么东西给你吗？

yingyinNormal.en: A little tight, isn't it? Why didn't you get a bigger table?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有点挤，不是吗？ 你为什么不订大一点的桌子呢？

yingyinNormal.en: You see, they're very tight. Maybe there's something in that area.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种裤子很紧，也许可以评论一下这个地方。

yingyinNormal.en: It wasn't until my skirts got tight that I realized my future was over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到裙子紧了，我才意识到未来全完了。

yingyinNormal.en: Since you and Nate are so tight, maybe you can broker that. Yeah. Maybe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然你和内特的关系那么好，也许你能帮她一下。是的，也许。

yingyinNormal.en: My wallet's too small for my fifties, and my diamond shoes are too tight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的钱太多，皮包装不下，我的钻石鞋太紧了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold tight. Fire. Fire. Dingdong dingdong. It's Miss Rabbit's fire engine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓紧了！救火了！救火了！叮咚！叮咚！兔小姐的消防车来了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to need a larger shirt. This one's a little tight under the arms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要一件更大的衬衫，这件腋下部位有点紧。

yingyinNormal.en: Your top three choices for running mate, they're all tight with the gun lobby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们竞选伙伴的三个首选，他们都是反对枪支管制说客的朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Windows are clean, candles are lit. Belts to tight, gotta change the belt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 窗户擦好了，蜡烛点上了，皮带太紧，我得去换一条。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you don't give up on that Teddy bear. You hang on tight. You find that bear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，不要放弃那只泰迪熊，抓紧点，找到那只熊。

yingyinNormal.en: Hold tight. Mr. Bull is waiting for the bus. One ticket to the music shop please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓紧了！公牛先生在等公共汽车。哞，我要一张去乐器商店的票，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Saving your life in London put me in a tight spot with some very dangerous people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在伦敦救你的事，让我陷入了非常危险的处境。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy pig and George are riding on the big wheel. Hold tight now. That really is high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸和乔治正坐在摩天轮上。好，抓紧了。这真是太高了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 紧紧地；坚固地；牢固地

word_family.mean: adj. 紧的；牢固的；不松动的；拉紧的；绷紧的；过于狭小的；无回旋余地的；醉醺醺的；紧密的；吝啬的

examination_example.sentence: Gen Zs are about to hit the streets looking for work in a labor market that's <highlight>tighter</highlight> than it's been in decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Z世代即将走上街头，在一个比以往几十年来更加紧张的劳动力市场寻找工作。

examination_example.sentence: By most measures, corporate governance has become a lot <highlight>tighter</highlight> and more rigorous since the 1970s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从大多数衡量标准来看，自20世纪70年代以来，公司的治理已变得更加紧缩和严格。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't matter, so long as they're enjoyable, such as going on a wild spending spree if you're on a <highlight>tight</highlight> budget.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比如说在预算紧张的时候去疯狂购物，只要你享受其中就没关系。

examination_example.sentence: If you have a bone to pick with someone in your workplace, you may try to stay <highlight>tight</highlight>-lipped around them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在公共场所对某人有意见，在他们身边的时候你可以试着守口如瓶。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 变紧；绷紧；变得更严格
adv. 紧紧地；坚固地；牢固地

word_family.mean: adj. 紧的；牢固的；不松动的；拉紧的；绷紧的；过于狭小的；无回旋余地的；醉醺醺的；紧密的；吝啬的

sense_info_list.en: closely constrained or constricted or constricting

examination_example.sentence_trans: 她习惯于紧张的日程安排。

examination_example.sentence: Manufacturers of products will face <highlight>tighter</highlight> rules on how they are advertised to consumers under changes proposed by the Federal Trade Commission.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据美国联邦贸易委员会提议的改革，产品制造商将面临更严格的规则，即如何向消费者宣传产品。

examination_example.sentence: Some are turning to the Internet, which is cheaper and offers concrete measurements like click-through rates—especially important at a time when marketing budgets are <highlight>tight</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人正在转向互联网，它更便宜，并提供点击率等具体衡量标准——在营销预算紧张的时候尤其重要。

examination_example.sentence: But we also found little interest in civic life beyond the <highlight>tight</highlight> circles of their family and immediate friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我们也发现，除了他们的家人和直系朋友的紧密圈子之外，他们对公民生活几乎没有兴趣。

sense_info_list.en: (of a rope, fabric, or surface) stretched so as to leave no slack

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 变紧；绷紧；变得更严格
adv. 紧紧地；坚固地；牢固地

word_family.mean: adj. 紧的；牢固的；不松动的；拉紧的；绷紧的；过于狭小的；无回旋余地的；醉醺醺的；紧密的；吝啬的

sense_info_list.en: (of money or time) limited or restricted
(of a ship; building; or object) well sealed against something such as water or air

examination_example.sentence: Decades of working over coal fires in <highlight>tight</highlight>, closed spaces with lite fresh air (to ensure his dishes would not get cold) had fatally damaged his lungs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数十年来，在狭窄封闭的空间中用稀薄的新鲜空气(以确保他的菜不会变冷)在煤火边进行工作，已经严重损害了他的肺部。

sense_info_list.en: closely constrained or constricted or constricting

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 紧紧地；坚固地；牢固地

word_family.mean: adj. 紧的；牢固的；不松动的；拉紧的；绷紧的；过于狭小的；无回旋余地的；醉醺醺的；紧密的；吝啬的

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>tight</highlight> schedule is no excuse for lack of action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 紧凑的日程安排不是缺乏行动的借口。

examination_example.sentence: I'd love to, Miss Wilson, but I've got a pretty <highlight>tight</highlight> schedule today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很想去，Wilson小姐，但我今天的日程安排得很紧。

examination_example.sentence: The ship was the Endurance, a small, <highlight>tight</highlight>, Norwegian-built three-master.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这艘船是耐力号，挪威制造的一艘小型、紧凑的三桅帆船。

examination_example.sentence: Susanna Reid is cooking up a storm in her latest role - showing families how to prepare delicious meals on a <highlight>tight</highlight> budget.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Susanna Reid最近的角色是煮得一手好菜——向家庭展示如何在预算紧张的情况下烹制出美味又营养的饭菜。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 变紧；绷紧；变得更严格
adv. 紧紧地；坚固地；牢固地

word_family.mean: adj. 紧的；牢固的；不松动的；拉紧的；绷紧的；过于狭小的；无回旋余地的；醉醺醺的；紧密的；吝啬的

examination_example.sentence: Under the space suit is another suit that looks like a pair of <highlight>tight</highlight> pajamas (睡衣) with little pipes running through them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宇航服下面是另一套宇航服，看起来像一件紧身睡衣，里面有小管子穿过。

examination_example.sentence: After this, the layered cloth is beaten again and again until it is <highlight>tight</highlight> (紧实的) enough to make soles and upper parts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这之后，将分层的布料反复拍打，直到它足够紧，可以制作鞋底和鞋面。

examination_example.sentence: Grandma hugged me <highlight>tight</highlight>, and suddenly I felt as though a big stone was gone from my stomach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奶奶紧紧地拥抱着我，我突然觉得肚子里悬着的石头消失了。
